Title: Resolutely support the communique of the Eleventh Plenum of the Eighth Party Congress, warmly welcome a new great victory of Mao Zedong Thought
Designer: People's Fine Arts Publishing House Creative Group (人民美术出版社创作组)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社), Beijing
Notes: The Eleventh Plenum of the Eighth Party Congress approved the 'Decision of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party Concerning the Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution', which set the course for the Cultural Revolution that had started earlier in May.This is a print from the second edition (September 1966)
Tags: National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
中国共产党全国代表大会
